file.name: ProductBrokerAgreement.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Product Broker Agreement
  description: This service domain maintains product broker contractual and service level agreements and tracks and confirms compliance and service related activity/volume goals when necessary
  version: 10.0.0
servers:
- description: SwaggerHub API Auto Mocking
  url: https://virtserver.swaggerhub.com/BIAN-3/ProductBrokerAgreement/10.0.0
paths:
  /ProductBrokerAgreement/Evaluate:
    post:
      tags:
      - CR - BrokerAgreement
      summary: EvCR Establish a product broker agreement (evaluate applicable rules)
      description: EvCR Establish a product broker agreement (evaluate applicable rules)
      operationId: Evaluate
      parameters: []
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/EvaluateBrokerAgreementRequest'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EvaluateBrokerAgreementResponse'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /ProductBrokerAgreement/{productbrokeragreementId}/Update:
    put:
      tags:
      - CR - BrokerAgreement
      summary: UpCR Update details of an active product broker agreement
      description: UpCR Update details of an active product broker agreement
      operationId: Update
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ProductBrokerAgreementID'
      requestBody:
        $ref: '#/components/requestBodies/BrokerAgreement'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BrokerAgreement'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/ForbiddenError'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TooManyRequestsError'
        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /ProductBrokerAgreement/{productbrokeragreementId}/Retrieve:
    get:
      tags:
      - CR - BrokerAgreement
      summary: ReCR Retrieve details about a broker agreement
      description: ReCR Retrieve details about a broker agreement
      operationId: Retrieve
      parameters:
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ProductBrokerAgreementID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:

        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequestError'
        401:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/UnauthorizedError'
        403:

        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFoundError'
        429:

        500:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/InternalServerError'
  /ProductBrokerAgreement/{productbrokeragreementId}/LegalTerms/Evaluate:
    post:

      description: EvBQ Establish the legal terms for a broker agreement

      parameters:

    get:

    get:

components:
  schemas:
    BrokerAgreement:
      type: object
      properties:
        PartyReference:
          type: object
        AgreementType:
          type: string
        AgreementJurisdiction:
          type: string
        AgreementValidFromOrToDate:
          type: string
        AgreementSignaturesOrResponsibleParties:
          type: string
        DocumentDirectoryEntryInstanceReference:
          type: object
    RegulatoryTerms:
      type: object
      properties:
        RegulatoryAuthority:
          type: string
        ApplicableRegulationReference:
          type: object
        ApplicableRegulationInterpretation:
          type: string
    LegalTerms:
      type: object
      properties:
        Jurisdiction:
          type: string
        ApplicableLawReference:
          type: object
        ApplicableLawInterpretation:
          type: string
    PolicyTerms:
      type: object
      properties:
        BankPolicy-RuleType:
          type: string
        ApplicableBankPolicy-RuleReference:
          type: object
        ApplicableBankPolicy-RuleInterpretation:
          type: string
    HTTPError:
      type: object
      properties:
        status_code:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
        message:
          type: string
    EvaluateBrokerAgreementRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        BrokerAgreement:
          type: object
          properties:
            PartyReference:
              type: object
            AgreementType:
              type: string
            AgreementValidFromOrToDate:
              type: string
            AgreementSignaturesOrResponsibleParties:
              type: string
            DocumentDirectoryEntryInstanceReference:
              type: object
    EvaluateBrokerAgreementResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        BrokerAgreement:
          type: object
          properties:
            AgreementJurisdiction:
              type: string
            AgreementValidFromOrToDate:
              type: string
            AgreementSignaturesOrResponsibleParties:
              type: string
            DocumentDirectoryEntryInstanceReference:
              type: object
    EvaluateLegalTermsRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        BrokerAgreement:
          type: object
          properties:
            PartyReference:
              type: object
            AgreementType:
              type: string
            AgreementJurisdiction:
              type: string
            AgreementValidFromOrToDate:
              type: string
            AgreementSignaturesOrResponsibleParties:
              type: string
            DocumentDirectoryEntryInstanceReference:
              type: object
        LegalTerms:
          type: object
          properties:
            ApplicableLawReference:
              type: object
    EvaluateLegalTermsResponse:

            ApplicableLawReference:

            Jurisdiction:
              type: string
            ApplicableLawReference:
              type: object
    RetrieveLegalTermsResponse:

          properties:
            PartyReference:

            AgreementType:
              type: string
            AgreementJurisdiction:
              type: string
            AgreementValidFromOrToDate:
              type: string
            AgreementSignaturesOrResponsibleParties:
              type: string
            DocumentDirectoryEntryInstanceReference:
              type: object
        LegalTerms:
          type: object
          properties:
            ApplicableLawReference:
              type: object
            ApplicableLawInterpretation:

    EvaluateRegulatoryTermsRequest:

              type: string
            AgreementJurisdiction:
              type: string
            AgreementValidFromOrToDate:
              type: string
            AgreementSignaturesOrResponsibleParties:
              type: string
            DocumentDirectoryEntryInstanceReference:
              type: object
        RegulatoryTerms:

    UpdateRegulatoryTermsRequest:
